title: [Large-Scale] Classroom Observation and Instructional Design Practice Based on Ecobehavioral Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational behavior analysis theories and understanding of observational assessment methods
context.additional_context: A program to strengthen competency in applying observational tools in language education settings

learning_goals: Classify classroom observation data in a VR simulation environment with 85% accuracy
Identify learner response opportunities (OTR) at least 15 times per hour using the EBAA tool
Propose at least three language lesson design improvements based on observational analysis results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
